title: is it just me?
body:
ive been playing this game for quite some time now and ive loved it...until recently
when i play games usually i get excited about all the people im going to meet, the teams im going to get but recently ive just gotten really tired of it tbh. i just cant get any enjoyment out of the game and i dont know y. maybe its because in fun modes people r too serious or that people are just mean and pick on u for trying something new and more diverse. does anyone else ever get this feeling?

replies.body:
Yeah, i'm feeling the same lately. 
The amount of ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ I have encountered in urf lately is too damn high. People are taking it way to seriously and go absolutely crazy if you pick a champion that isn't op (I get so much ♥♥♥♥ for playing Quinn and Sivir in urf, norms and ranked).

I have pretty much given up trying to play with complete randoms and have now decided that it will be premade or nothing.

> [{quoted}](name=yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eBEiWy7T,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-05T06:25:00.925+0000)
>
> People are taking it way to seriously and go absolutely crazy if you pick a champion that isn't op (I get so much ♥♥♥♥ for playing Quinn and Sivir in urf, norms and ranked).
> 

Just mute or ignore those guys and keep playing the champions that you want to. People rubbish me for taking exhaust instead of teleport, but it doesn't stop me :) And I'm sure my KDA is higher that theirs in URF, even Sackboy's. ;)
Don't worry. Teemo's mushroom effect will wear off after you step on the 302nd, then wait 4 hours.
Yes which is why I have been spamming other solo player games for like 2 months, just hop on a good single player game and take a break.
